content: crochet the fanfare hat with just one ball of variegated yarn i used the color parrot this hat is made bottom-up in one piece and shaped to fit the head it s easy to customize for a slouchier look by repeating the pattern row the free pattern includes sizes from baby to adult you can also make the matching fanfare scarf with the same ball of yarn this is just one of the patterns included in our hat of the month club collection **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d **unique features-** includes sizes from preemie to adult l for a perfect fit detailed photo tutorial and written instructions for easy crafting uses soft and warm alula double knit yarn for comfort **materials needed-** hooks 4mm us size 6 0 5mm us size 8 0 yarn alula double knit dk weight 100-250 yards gauge 15 stitches by 13 row = 4 inches in worked in pattern stitch **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
